title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: More older adults are dying from falls. Here’s how to reduce the risk.
items.description: Death rates from falls jumped more than 70% for older adults in the last 20 years.

items.title: Bitcoin’s ascent reaches a new record as shorts fold and inflows mount
items.description: Bitcoin hit a fresh high above $118,000 on Friday a day after the second-highest daily inflows on record to bitcoin ETFs.

items.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
items.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

items.title: Government spending and capital expenditure ‘supercycle’ drive latest S&P 500 target boost
items.description: BNP’s strategy note “Running It Hot” predicts the S&P 500 at 6,700 12 months out, with Eurostoxx 600 rising to 590.

items.title: Here are three big things the market is getting wrong about U.S. stocks, says this bank
items.description: The market is underestimating U.S. growth and is too pessimistic about earnings, says HSBC.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
